spiritsExplanation:
The workout 'To the Max Row' delivers an 'High-Energy & Intense' spirit as indicated by its title and the description mentioning 'maximum effort' and 'intervals,' which are suggestive of intense and vigorous activity. The music playlist includes energizing, upbeat songs like 'Eye Of The Tiger' and 'Gotta Get Thru This,' enhancing the high-energy vibe, earning this spirit a score of 0.9.

The presence of an outdoor rowing image definitively places this workout in the 'Outdoor & Adventure' category. The image depicts rowing on a river, which aligns with 'nature-based workouts' and 'environmental challenges,' justifying a score of 0.8.

The 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit is also relevant due to the mention of 'climbing in rhythm' and the playlist's dance tracks that encourage a coordinated, rhythmic flow. The structured intervals imply continuity of motion, which aligns moderately with this spirit, resulting in a score of 0.6.
